title: Honeydew in Mint Syrup
introduction: Experience a refreshing combination of cool honeydew melon and fresh mint syrup, inspired by the delightful finales of seaside dinners in Sicily.
ingredients: 1/2 cup packed fresh spearmint leaves, plus more for garnish
8 to 12 slices peeled ripe honeydew melon
instructions: 1. In a saucepan, combine the water, sugar, and mint leaves. Bring to a simmer and cook 1 minute or until the leaves are wilted. Remove from the heat. Let cool, then pass the syrup through a fine-mesh strainer into a bowl to strain out the mint leaves.
2. Place the melon on a serving platter and pour the syrup over the melon. Chill in the refrigerator briefly. Serve garnished with mint leaves.
